# P4 code share repository

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/USCbiostats/P4.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/USCbiostats/P4)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of this repository is to share code and results for various ongoing analysis.

Files commited to this repository should be limited to

- rmarkdown/markdown files
- html files
- figures

Files that should be commited include

- data
- very large files
